Title: Expression of Neutrophil-related genes in patients with early sepsis-induced ARDS
Type:
Clinical study of critically ill patients with sepsis and sepsis-related ARDS with whole blood RNA collected within the first 24 hours of admission
Goal of the study was to determine whether biologically relevant genes were identified  to be differentially expressed genes in patients with sepsis alone and sepsis with ARDS
Overall-Design: Prospective observational study, case cohort design
